name: Lifetab
tagline: It's a lifelogging webapp which you can set to open on new tab. It has features like journals, to-do list etc. It requires google login.
body:
### LifeTab
This project was created in a team of 3 for a college hackathon. It got us the [Byld](http://byld.iiitd.edu.in/) memberships :D

### About LifeTab
As the name suggests it's a platform where you can keep tabs on your life. Create to-do lists, make journal entries. This can be set to open on a new tab and used from there. It also has a google search bar.

### Working App
Though the app is not hosted anywhere, you can view the functionality via a video [here] (http://media1000.dropshots.com/photos/1257638/20150310/183453.mp4)

### Authors and Contributors
We are an awesome team of 3 called ThirdFaction. This is one of the projects we did together.
* [Shivam Chaturvedi] (https://github.com/devs4v)
* [Anjali Ujjainia] (https://github.com/Anjali2906)
* [Soumya Sharma] (http://github.com/soummyaah)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
